"Editando tu tarjeta ARKS!":
"Arks these days are lazy! Most of them
don't understand how important it is to
properly identify yourself. A good Arks
card is like an introduction.
Make sure you set it up in advance. For
other Arks, it's like speaking a thousand
words. Your whole party will be able to
view it.

En mi tarjeta ARKS, I like putting hobbies..."
"Guarda cualquier texto en tu tarjeta ARKS"
